price: 111. (Esos rebeldes) no podrán perjudicaros en nada, salvo causaros algunas molestias (principalmente de palabra). Y si lucharan contra vosotros, se retirarían (derrotados) y no serían socorridos.
arabic: لَن يَضُرُّوكُمۡ إِلَّآ أَذٗىۖ وَإِن يُقَٰتِلُوكُمۡ يُوَلُّوكُمُ ٱلۡأَدۡبَارَ ثُمَّ لَا يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lan yaḍurrūkum illā adhan wa-in yuqātilūkum yuwallūkumu al-adbāra thumma lā yunṣarūna
